      To register extensions for KeyedExtensionCollector for test purposes, where extension instance can be KeyedLazyInstance and not a real bean class, because often it is not possible to use one (for example, LanguageExtensionPoint).

      • registerExtension

        public void registerExtension(PluginDescriptor pluginDescriptor,
                              Element extensionElement,
                              java.lang.String extensionNs)
        Description copied from interface: ExtensionsArea
        Registers a new extension.
        Specified by:
        registerExtension in interface ExtensionsArea
        Parameters:
        pluginDescriptor - plugin to which extension belongs
        extensionElement - element from plugin.xml file where extension settings are specified
        extensionNs - extension namespace which is prepended to the tag name from extensionElement to form the qualified extension name.

      • registerFakeBeanPoint

        public <T> ExtensionPointImpl<T> registerFakeBeanPoint(java.lang.String name,
                                                       PluginDescriptor pluginDescriptor)
        To register extensions for KeyedExtensionCollector for test purposes, where extension instance can be KeyedLazyInstance and not a real bean class, because often it is not possible to use one (for example, LanguageExtensionPoint).
